abstract: While shares of Facebook are roughly 24 percent below their offering price, those of rivals like LinkedIn, Pandora and Groupon are flat or even up over the same time period.
snippet: While shares of Facebook are roughly 24 percent below their offering price, those of rivals like LinkedIn, Pandora and Groupon are flat or even up over the same time period.
lead_paragraph: Facebook doesn’t seem to be casting a long shadow over social networking stocks.

headline.main: Liking LinkedIn, While Wary of Facebook
